references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a foundation for many modern text-to-image generation methods, including the one presented in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces Imagen, a highly influential text-to-image model that significantly advanced the field, and its architectural principles are relevant to the current work.

references.paper_title: SDXL: Improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces SDXL, a state-of-the-art high-resolution image generation model that serves as a comparison and baseline for the model presented in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is important because it introduces a method of taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis that is relevant to the method used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Würstchen: An efficient architecture for large-scale text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the StableCascade architecture, which is directly used and extended in the proposed model of this paper, making it crucial for understanding the context and innovation.
